about_the_game:
Plot

Nav is a phrase used to denote the souls of the dead in Slavic mythology, this word was a general name for demons arising out of the souls of tragic and premature deaths, killers, warlocks, the murdered and the drowned dead.
A young historian returns to the abandoned village where he spent his childhood.
The boy has recently been diagnosed with a fatal heart disease. He needs an expensive operation. He remembers that the villagers kept a unique ancient pagan artifact, which can become the pearl of any collection. Finding and selling the item is the only chance of survival.
But the abandoned village is not as empty as it seems at first glance. He will have to face the unkind ghosts of the past and finally remember what he has been trying to forget for so many years: what happened that summer?

Entourage

You will be immersed in a world where the boundary between the worlds is erased, terrible Slavic fairy tales come to life, and from behind the boundary comes Nav, wanting to take you with them.
The setting is an abandoned village somewhere in Eastern Europe.

name: Nav Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3100 / Core i3-8300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5000 / Core i3 12100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 1660 Super / Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Nav is a first-person horror game set in an abandoned village in Eastern Europe. Confront your deepest fears to rectify the sins of the past.
